column1: Hi Um my name is Dave Navarro and um I'd like to tell you that I'm your tour guide for today Um my pronouns are he him and I'm from India I'd like you to introduce you to a northeastern Californian community Like uh show you features of student life here in the Bay area and tell you about what this college offers to our excellent students Uh Let's start Uh Um but like I have to tell you one thing Before we start uh please remember to use the restroom now as restroom breaks will not be provided uh throughout the tour Okay Let's start Northeastern University Oakland was formed between a merger between um like Northeastern University and like Mills College Um not Mills College was founded in 1852 in Benicia California and then was shifted to Oakland in um like 1871 Um northeastern also houses an experiential learning program that allows
